website_summaries.verdict: A good pick for practicing handsprings and cartwheels. Just don't expect to use it as a cushy pad for falls.
pros: Light enough for older children to move
not appropriate for cushioning falls or landings
Choice of colors and 1-3/8-inch or 2-inch thickness
2-foot wide folding panels with hook-and-loop closure at each end
Constructed with 18-ounce knife-coated vinyl and EVA
cons: Arrives with a strong chemical smell, but it fades over time

website_summaries.verdict: Considered one of the highest-quality tumbling mats available for purchase, this product is sure to impress.
pros: Known for a durable construction with heavy-duty vinyl, EVA foam, and thickness
Various sizes and colors available for purchase
cons: A few customers complained that they received a different mat than the one they ordered

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality and coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Excellent quality, but an expensive purchase. We purchased the 5ft x 10ft x 2in. Great for 14 year old doing gymnastics every single day. Wonderful for yoga/conditioning as well. Would also be very useful for people with babies and toddlers--great coverage for the floor in case of messy accidents, learning how to walk, and even great padding for parents and grandparents to sit on "floor" and play with the kids and grandkids! We've only had this about 2 weeks, but the quality seems amazing so far with hours of use every day during summer break! Recommend! I would greatly appreciate it if you mark this review as helpful--thank you! :-)
customer_reviews.author: ArganMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and durability!
customer_reviews.text: This mats are professionally made with very high quality materials. I can tell the difference between this one and other cheaper mats. This will withstand years and years of heavy usage. No smell/odor like some mentioned in other reviews. We are keeping it in my daughters huge bedroom with no problems. Plus color is very bright and exactly like on he picture. One thing that would make it better is to have possibility to attach an other one on the side, to make it wider and not just longer. Otherwise it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: svkru

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my stepdaughter. Exactly what we were looking for. Sure, it's a bit more expensive than some of the other ones available here on Amazon but the quality is what you pay for. This thing is perfect for gymnastics and other physical activities.
customer_reviews.author: J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old takes it out by herself!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat for gymnastics practice in the house. (Yes, I cringe as I type the 'in the house' part.) 9 year old can pull it out by herself and set it up with no problem. She's been using it nonstop since Christmas day. Some people mentioned a strong odor, but I don't smell anything that isn't expected with a gym mat. It's not overwhelming at all and we've had it in our living room for a week. Great product. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: raine23611

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Received in time. Initial quality good. Some people complaining about smell and allergy. It does smell a little bit. I bought it for my granddaughter who is sensitive to some chemicals, but she was OK with this material and she uses it very often. She is using it for stretches and some martial arts practice. I can imagine that there could be people with some specific allergies but for an average person I think this is acceptable.. Very easy and lightweight to fold. Does not slip on a hardwood floor. I was considering thinner and smaller mats, but I think it is a better choice. Pretty happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C

customer_reviews.title: Firm--not squishy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality gymnastics mat--same as you find in gymnastics schools. While mats may differ in thickness and firmness (depending on brand and also on intended purpose), this particular mat is on the firm side, which is good for practicing cartwheels, walkovers and even handsprings if the gymnast is capable--but this is not a crash mat and should not be used for stunts. I knew what I was getting before I ordered this, and am very pleased with my purchase. I saved money ordering a repackaged item and there were no flaws whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: A really great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price and honestly wasn't expecting much but decided to go for it. This mat had a small scuff about the size of a old school 50 cent piece on the top vinyl probably from shipping but the rest of it was perfect! Great quality! Vibrant colors! Great price! Love Tumbl Trak products!!! Our little gym can't afford a lot and mats are super spendy! So thank you soooo much for the Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jahneezomah

customer_reviews.title: Great fall protection and comes in a variation of colors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat to provide fall protection under our Tumbl Trak Kip Bar. The mat was shipped promptly, arrived on time, and was exactly what I ordered per the specifications online. Per Tumbl Trak's Customer Service recommendation, the mat fit perfectly under the Kip Bar. There were no issues with set up. Love the colors we picked!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Finnerty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mat
customer_reviews.text: We did some research before selecting this 5x10 mat over comparable mats from our daughters gymnastics gym mat sale. 1st the 18 oz. vinyl and 2" cross-linked polyethylene foam is top of the line. (This is the better type of foam with a safer thickness than the 1.5") The colors of the rainbow mat are nice if you have a girl rather than the primary color mats from other manufacturers. Yes it has a smell when you take it out of the box, but we left it in the garage in the box with the plastic wrap off it and it was fine; nothing too worry about for us. Shipping was great and FREE.
customer_reviews.author: SutoJL

customer_reviews.title: 2 years heavy use and it still is in like new condition
customer_reviews.text: We've been so pleased with this mat. We bought it for our daughter's 6th birthday and she's now 8 and uses it every day all the time. There are still no signs of wear or tear on any seams. It's long enough to do 2 standing backhand springs or an aerial or a power roundoff back handspring and stay on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Miss

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat 2 years ago and my 3 kids use it everyday for gymnastics tumbling, wrestling or jiujitsu practices. I ordered the the 4' x 8' x 1 3/8" mat and I got my money's worth so far. The only thing that would make this mat perfect in my opinion is to add velcro attachments to all 4 sides.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: The 4x8 is just the right size for now...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays and practices for yours. She loves this, best thing is it can grow as she does; it has Velcro sides so additional pieces can be purchased and added for more tumble and protected area. I heard this size does does not wear down as easily or fast, it provides our 9 year old with just enough support and protection she needs, we all love it. It folds and stores out of the way when not in use. Highly recommend this beautifully colored tumbling mat.
customer_reviews.author: WMW

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 4' x 6' x 2" tumble trak gymnastic folding tumble panel Mat and received a 3'11.5" x 5'10 3/4" x 2" mat. Plan to return it because my husband whose 6' and me whose 5' find working out on it impossible.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bushner

customer_reviews.title: Great mat. 5x10x1 3/8.
customer_reviews.text: This was for a 7 year old aspiring gymnast. Went with the 5x10 so as not to outgrow it to quickly despite the price jump vs. the 4x8. Ordered on a Saturday and got it Monday. 1 3/8 is thick enough for berber over concrete. Very firm foam. Cover is heavy duty and this the equal to a school or commercial quality mat. Price was about the lowest I found for the mat and included shipping and I looked around at a lot of online places. You can mate more then one with the built in velcro. I would recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favorite sang gift by far
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite sang gift by far. The thickness of 2” is perfect. Love the colors. Folds up nicely. Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: thelma perez

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect for my daughter to use in the house to practice her gymnastics. We bought a larger one first and returned for the smaller one. For where she is in her skill level, it was too cumbersome and unnecessarily large.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews Help

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality mat, similar to the ones at the gym. I purchased this for my daughter three years ago and it’s still in great condition. I recommend getting at least two mats (they attached with velcro) for any tumbling involving a roundoff. I also recommend getting a large wedge if your child is trying to get their standing back handspring or tuck.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best Cartwheel or Tumbling Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tumbling mat or cartwheel mat. It can be used for many purposes. Very well made. Looks fantastic Amazing quality. This can be folded and used for height to practice other gymnastic moves. Very happy with Tumbl Trak products.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great texture and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our 10 year old to practice her standing tumbling. We have had other mats in the past, but the tumble track has just the right support for both acrobatics and gymnastics
customer_reviews.author: Miss TG

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for beginner and intermediate levels
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves it. She plays on it everyday and it's easy enough for her to fold/unfold it and even move it around the room. It's great protection for when she practices cartwheels and backbends, etc. When I first opened it, it did have a little odor but I left it out in the garage overnight and was able to bring it into the house to use the next day. The colors are great and she keeps bugging me to get another one so I can turn the whole living room into a gymnastics room. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: FreddyMo

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES her mat. It's perfect quality, just as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marshall Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it! Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Mat is great quality and good size for my 10 year old to safely practice his hand stand and backflips in our basement. Would not go down to the 1" ...for price difference its worth the extra thickness imo. Folds up nicely for storage and the Velcro side strip work well to keep it from slipping on carpeted surface. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great for a baby learning to walk ... through a big kid
customer_reviews.text: These are great mats. They do stink of vinyl when you first get them, especially if it's warm, but that evaporates within 2 days or so, and you could just keep them open outside. Were using these with our 1 year old baby, and it's great to have a surface that she can fall and play on, especially as she's learning to walk, but I think this will be a fixture in our playroom for years. The mats are all connected.
customer_reviews.author: Mido

customer_reviews.title: Fun way play gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: I love this pad so much, it is thick and enough space that my son who is 2.5 can play on it and do some gymnastics movement. We can use it as pad or lift up two side and create a tunnel.... it has so much fun way to play
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made Floor Mat
customer_reviews.text: Quality made floor mat. This was the highlight of my kids Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Beyer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it. She is in gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. She is in gymnastics, now she can practice safely at home. I may order another one later on.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Evans

customer_reviews.title: good quality and folds up easily
customer_reviews.text: i like this product alot. The quality is good and it looks pretty well made so i imagine it will hold up well. My daughter loves it and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Polito

customer_reviews.title: FLIPPING great job!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mat came right on time for my granddaughter's birthday and it was a HUGE hit!!!!! The quality is top notch and it looks like it should last a long time. Even aunts and a grandmother joined in on doing gymnastic tricks at the birthday party once the gift of the mat was opened.......but most of all, my granddaughter was thrilled!!!! I Would happily order from this company again....you can trust that they will ship out their merchandise as quickly and safely as they say......GREAT JOB!!!!!!!!! A++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love the mat but....
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the mat Santa left Christmas morning! She's level 2 on team and this was a great purchase for her to practice at home. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the smell! I really wish I had taking it out of the box when I bought it and left in the garage to off gas in there. The smell is pretty strong. I would buy it again but I would definitely hide it in the garage for a couple weeks first!
customer_reviews.author: S Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great In-Home Gymnastics Practice Mat
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for my daughter and she loves it. As a former competitive gymnast & then coach's assistant I'm pretty picky when it comes safety equipment. This mat works does exactly what a good mat should do- have enough thickness to soften a fall, while staying firm enough to handle short practice passes. (If you want a longer track you can always buy one more, as they are built to Velcro together.) A definite thumbs up from me! Hope that helps! ~JB
customer_reviews.author: JB PopEggs

customer_reviews.title: Quality mat
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mat because of the colors shown but received a different color. I see the issue has since been resolved and one should now get what is pictured here (blue/pink/purple). Because we preferred the old color shown (green/pink/purple) we did end up returning the mat (super easy return and lightening fast refund!) and went with a different mat altogether (solid pink). The solid pink mat by the other company seems *slightly* inferior to this mat. Having had the opportunity to compare the mats I will shop Tumbl Trak first now for future gymnastics equipment purchases!
customer_reviews.author: A. Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good spring to it and nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is longer and wider than the mat my granddaughter has which she loves. It's also not quite as thick and she thinks she gets better spring on it. She loves it so much it stays in the middle of the family room floor all the time. If there was room, she would probably want another one.
customer_reviews.author: sandra ansell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the mats at gymnastics class! My daughter uses this for practicing handstands and cartwheels. It is also makes a nice bench seating for the kids when folded for watching tv, or for forts when stood up on it's side!
customer_reviews.author: karelle

customer_reviews.title: I am certainly impressed with the SUPER FAST Prime shipping (I ordered Saturday and got it ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I am certainly impressed with the SUPER FAST Prime shipping (I ordered Saturday and got it Monday) and the quality of this mat! My daughter is 5'3 and needed a tumbling mat to practice her kick overs for cheer. This had plenty of room and length for a full flip or a cart wheel. I was afraid it might be slippery but it laid nice and flat on our garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mat for 3 years and is still in excellent condition. Both our daughters use this mat constantly. We absolutely love it and plan on buying another to attach soon.
customer_reviews.author: Shana McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect mat she needed for her routines
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is a gymnast. This was the perfect mat she needed for her routines. She loves it. She also has two more sisters, and they love the mat also. They all can practice and it is plenty large enough for them. It is very good quality and when they are on the beam and fall they feel more at ease with this mat. By the way, she is 7 and already in level 4.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased mats from a big box sports retailer and they simply do not compare with this mat. My little gymnast (7) will not even attempt a back handspring on the other mats but this one has much stronger padding, keeping her more safe. These can be stepped on without feeling the hard floor underneath. I'm under the concept, especially on safety equipment, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: keven marion

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a great quality mat. I was hesitant based on the price but glad I bought it. The purple is a great color and the material is nice. Very good quality product. Folds perfectly to store out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Cute colors!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been non-stop tumbling at our house since receiving this! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Adrie Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used mat for 15% off, and I swear it's new. Just the packaging was opened. Great mat, but the fabric does sort of bunch a little on top. I also wish they had a cover for the velcro strip since we only have one right now. My daughter has been practicing her gymnastics at home and I feel as though she's much safer now that we have a quality padded mat.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little gymnast!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday present and my daughter LOVES it! I am very pleased at how easy it is to fold and store! I inside, outside, upstairs and downstairs. This mat has been used everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Christina T

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is AMAZING!! We got the 5x10 & it’s HUGE. My son will soon start to receive in home therapy and we are starting a home therapy room for him this is going to make everyone more comfortable to work, GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for kids. I purchased this for my 18 month old grandson and he loves it. I had one made by Tiffin Mat company 25 years ago when our children were toddlers in primary colors and my daughter wanted the same type for our grandson. This one is just as nice and sturdy. I purchased it on a lightening deal for $139.99 which is an excellent price for the 4 x 8 x 2 in size.
customer_reviews.author: musicgenes

customer_reviews.title: Gymnastics padding
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It is great !! Thick and folds easy. Made great. Good value for the money. I am confident she won’t get hurt doing tumbles when using.
customer_reviews.author: susan walpole

customer_reviews.title: This is toxic
customer_reviews.text: This mat smells so toxic I had to move it to my garage. Can’t believe this is sold for use by children!
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feels right
customer_reviews.text: It's what we expected it to be and works as it should. Just be prepared to leave it open for a week or two either outside or in the garage before use, for degassing.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: After used it at home, we loved it. It has high quality material. The backside is non-slippery, and it doesn't move when we place it on the laminated floor, even jump on it (that's the purpose of the mat). My son loves it too, and practice more Hip-hop tricks on it.
customer_reviews.author: ybwan

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Mat- literally!  But well made and great cushion
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy well made tumbling mat with velcro at either end. Love the colors! Only negative and why no 5 stars is it absolutely STUNK upon arrival. The worst chemically plastic smell ever! We've now had the mat for about 3-4 months and the smell seems to be wearing off but can only imagine what funk we have been breathing in the meantime. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: DancinD

customer_reviews.title: Great mats to practice gymnastic skills
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat for practicing some tumbling skills. My kids are in acrobatic gymnastics, but they use this for block work so if they fall they don't fall on the wood floors. It's also used when they practice bridge work, back walkovers, baldez, cartwhells, and other skills. Combined with a 4 incher, they can do small passes with roundoffs. I bought two to create a 10x10 area. While the price is the same if you buy from the manufacturer, with Amazon, you have the potential to get free shiping which saves you hundreds. Only reason for not giving it a 5-star is that the mats don't connect well side-by-side, only length wise.
customer_reviews.author: Dadheartsacro

customer_reviews.title: Gymnastics Mat
customer_reviews.text: My children take gymnastics and I bought this for them to practice at home. It's soft and sturdy and I don't worry so much about them falling on this versus the carpeted floor. The mat is a good length and thickness, it folds easily, and it seems like it will hold up for a long time with minimal care.
customer_reviews.author: Polarbarr21

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these...a large and smaller one. Both are holding up very well...no rips or tears. They do small when they first arrive, so I had them in the garage or outside for a few days to air out. No residual smell though! Nov 2015 Update - STILL great! This has been slid across concrete, put out in the rain and gotten wet a bunch of times while being used as a slip & slide into the pool. Absolutely great product.
customer_reviews.author: Aquitaine

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat. Padding is very generous but still firm and safe to stand on. It doesn't slip on concrete floors. It is well made and a good value for the price. Would have given it 5 stars but it didn't have the sewn in handles for carrying it around. Otherwise its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chi-town

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat- but you might not receive the color that you ordered
customer_reviews.text: The mat is perfect, very solid- but not hard. However, we ordered the multi color as shown in the photo and online, but received purple. not a big deal, but one should receive exactly what is ordered. The mat itself is great and it would have been too much trouble to send it back to exchange and not worth the time and expense. It arrives in a huge box- (unfolded).
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Exec Coach

customer_reviews.title: Tumbl Trak Mat hit a home run in our house! Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get much better for the budding young gymnast at home! Tired of seeing little one bounce and bump her way through the house, decided this year would be a good one to start setting up an area for her to practice safely and efficiently whenever she'd like. This is a hard-core pro quality mat! Surprised by how thick and supportive the cushion really is, I've been using it for our workouts, yoga etc as well! Don't hesitate; this Tumbl Mat will serve you well and last long!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: My daughters love their mats!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like its thickness, its ability to fold, and all around looks of it
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this mat!!! Great product thats durable, easy to clean, and easily folds away for storage. My daughter and friends use it just about everyday. Glad we decided on the 5x10, because the 4x8 would have been to small for our four year old to play on. Great product! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Flaking and cracking outer cover
customer_reviews.text: Light weight for easy moving, but outer material is already peeling off after one week of use with only very light use.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Marie Holleman

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for a 3 and 6 year old. They absolutely love it. It's plenty thick so they won't hurt themselves. It's light and portable - the six year old can move it herself with ease. There was a faint odor when we took it out of the box but it went away very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nick N. N.

customer_reviews.title: ... for the kids to practice - the mats are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for wrestling and Brazilian Jiu Jitsu for the kids to practice - the mats are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod B

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely pleased with this mat
customer_reviews.text: I am a crazy researcher, so I looked at a ton of professional mat companies online. I decided to go with this one on amazon bc of ease of return if it was not what we were looking for. I am extremely pleased with this mat! It is equivalent to those in my daughter's gym. I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: ISUGrads97

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: What you see in the gymnasium is what you get here. It's a tumble mat! It did not smell as other ratings mentioned. The purple/pink/blue/green color combo is an eye catcher and so bright - all kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: paulj

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat was exactly what my daughter wanted for her 12th birthday. Tumbl Trak products were recommended to me by a gymnastics teacher & this mat is great quality. I'm glad we went with the 5 x 10 for her, and if you have a child over age 8 or one who wants to be able to go multiple tricks in a row you will want this size if you have space for it. The colors are very nice because they are not pastel or primary, just bright pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: M&L's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I feel much more comfortable now that she is doing gymnastics on a mat
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves this mat for handstands, cartwheels, back bends, etc. I feel much more comfortable now that she is doing gymnastics on a mat, compared to the hardwood floor. As other reviewers mentioned, there was an initial smell (plastic?) that was quite strong. I opened and aired out the mat (standing up) before use - we've had it since March and the smell is long gone.
customer_reviews.author: VA mom

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with mat
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with mat! soft and sturdy but not soft. That's great because if there is to much softness than the mat can become unstable
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in a home gym under my yoga sling, so if I fall off, I won’t crack my head. The mat is soft enough to fall on but, firm enough to do a headstand on. It folds and unfolds easily and functions better than I expected. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: TerraBellaRosa

customer_reviews.title: The cost is worth it bc the quality is fantastic. There is no funky smell that reviewers complained ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my level 2 gymnast. It big enough for her to grow into it. The cost is worth it bc the quality is fantastic. There is no funky smell that reviewers complained about with other brands of gym mats. This is a great but.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and easy to store. I would compare it to the mats at our dance studio!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Russell

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to have at home for our little gymnast to practice!! Easy enough to fold up and put in the corner or a closet when not in use. Love the thickness. The bright colors are so pretty! Seems to be really well made. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: mamamica

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter who is in HipHop Dance and performs lots of stunts. It definitely holds up and is still in great shape. She uses it outside on the ground and it has had no tears or rips. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been practicing gymnastics for 2 years and we got this for her to practice at home. She absolutely loves it! The padding is 2" thick so it feels like she is at the gym. And it folds up and can be put away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old uses this almost on a daily basis. She can even drag it around from the playroom to the living room on her own when it's folded, and she likes to jump on and off the stacked mat when folded. Added bonus for getting extra energy out in the winter months! It's got a nice Velcro feature to secure it to the carpet when unfolded. It did have a funky smell for the first week or two but after that it's been fine. The pretty colors are appreciated. Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for my 11 year-old, she loves it. (She's 52" tall) Very good quality, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these and fit them together side ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and fit them together side by side with a floor height balance beam between them. My daughter uses this setup to practice her snow board rail jumps in the garage. It protects the garage floor, snow board from cracking when it hits the ground, and her knees when she misses the rail and lands on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Leone

customer_reviews.title: Top Tumbl Trak!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Tumbling Mat - was just as expected and described. Got is for our six year old granddaughter - at her request for her birthday. Now I'm sure we'll get a request for a second one to attach on her Christmas list.
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbling mat
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality. Nice size for my 7 yr old tumbler. One caution: can slide on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: BNK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners or advanced.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old daughter. Great training tool for her for gymnastics. She loves it! A lot of cushion and easy to store, move, etc. Fits well in our living room. She uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this online, not thinking the quality would be there. I was surprised again. My daughter uses it EVERYDAY!! It's great to put down on hard floors, the thickness of the mat is great.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mat. High quality, just like the mats in daughter's gymnastics class. She uses at home everyday to practice cartwheels, handstands etc. My DH is not easily impressed, but wowed by this mat. I will be ordering another when we purchase a kip bar.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi T

customer_reviews.title: i love that it folds up and we can store it ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 and loves to Cheer we Bought her this to practice at home and she uses it all the time. it makes it easier for her to practice at home. i love that it folds up and we can store it when she is not using it.
customer_reviews.author: TheFrosts

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE This mat! If you are looking for a mat that you can use at home (not professionally), for a great price then look no further! this is the perfect mat!!! We have loved it from day one! It has been 6 mo and we haven't had a single issue. WE do use it inside!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good mat overall. Took a LONG time for the smell to dissipate. Folds up surprisingly small. Store behind your sofa. This is a crash mat suitable for throwing (judo, wrestling) and tumbling and just overkill for stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Colt American

customer_reviews.title: Good thick mat for practicing at home
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice thick mat and has held up well in our crazy home. My only complaint is that we ordered this lovely multi-colored one shown and received a solid purple one. It was too much hassle to return so we just kept it. But I was annoyed that we did not get what we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: BFam2003

customer_reviews.title: These have held up much better then cheaper brands in our indoor play and party ...
customer_reviews.text: These have held up much better then cheaper brands in our indoor play and party center. Definitely worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for kids to practice gymnastics on. Did not notice overwhelming smell although we kept in garage till Christmas
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: A good quality mat
customer_reviews.text: A good quality mat. Thick enough for my 8 year old but light enough she can fold it up and move it around. The only downside is that this company sells out of other colors just before the holidays. So order early in the holiday shopping season!
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: So much better than on my rug
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my granddaughter and she absolutely loves it. She does all kinds of flips and tumbles with this. So much better than on my rug.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Callinan

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbling mat
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 year old to practice on. It is very well made, looks great on both sides, and you cannot find one cheaper shipped to you house. It does smell when taken out of the box, but after I left it in the garage for a day, it does not smell any more. Great Amazon purchase!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rp4vt

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my toddler (and my knees) to crawl around and play on. There is a slight smell when first taken out of the package, but in a few days, no odor at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: We received wrong color
customer_reviews.text: We received one all navy blue which was a bummer since we specifically ordered the one with pink on it for our daughter. Amazon customer service was great and refunded us some of our purchase price to make up for it. It was going to be a huge hassle to send this large item back to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pahl

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought it would be. Very satisfied with this purchase. It is the harder pad which is exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Cipriano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my gymnastics loving child!!! This is easy for her to move around, and she LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.author: krhalliburton

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have the ability to fold and store, so far durable
customer_reviews.author: AvaMom

customer_reviews.title: KIDS ARE PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a christmas present for our game room. It gets a lot of use, lots of tumbling, dancing, stomping, sitting, and it has held up well for 6 months and counting. folds up nicely, heavy enough to provide cushion but light enough that the kids can move it themselves. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Just what my constant tumbling six-year-old needed. This thing is very thick, well-made, and will last for many many years. Seriously, one of the best purchases I've ever made for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Heather L White

customer_reviews.title: Great for Exercise
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6ft version which I use for exercises and it works well. It is firm and easy to fold up and carry out of the way. It has v.elcro for extensions. It did not have a smell other than new vinyl and was not a strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Waterprisms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with their gymnastics bar. Mat is thick and high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: normanps

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Just as good as the ones at the
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Just as good as the ones at the gym
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: The joy of hours of fun for my child
customer_reviews.text: The joy of hours of fun for my child. They don’t slip on the floor they firm nicely to the floors
customer_reviews.author: melissa Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Safe Gymnastics mat
customer_reviews.text: 11 yr old loves to practice on her balance beam and she uses this as a safety mat beside the beam.
customer_reviews.author: becky dangelo

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled Me!!
customer_reviews.text: Can do any exercise on it!! Thick and firm. Knees never hurt doing any exercise or stretch and it's big enough for all exercises. Firm enough to do balancing and has spoiled me for anything else. Worth every cent!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tumbl Trak Gymnastics Folding Tumbling Panel Mat
product_meta.description: Tumbl Trak’s folding panel tumbling mats are perfect for gymnastics, cheerleading, crossfit, parkour, dance, martial arts, special needs, yoga, Pilates, exercise and much more! The mats are great for use at home or at the gym. The mats are firm to help your kids practice surefooted tumbling. They are not appropriate for cushioning falls or landings.
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY - Each mat is covered in an extremely durable 18oz knife coated vinyl material. The vinyl is stretched tightly over an industry leading EVA foam (the highest quality cross-linked polyethylene foam on the market).

PERFECT FOR MULTIPLE ACTIVITIES. If you’re a gymnast, dancer, cheerleader, martial artist, fitness enthusiast, or anybody other activity that has a need for a durable matting option; look no further than Tumbl Trak!

DON’T BE FOOLED BY CHEAPER COMPETITORS - Tumbl Trak has been in making the highest quality gymnastics products for 30 years. Don’t let a cheaper price lure you in, Tumbl Trak offers unrivaled quality and will withstand even the most rigorous use.

SUPERIOR DESIGN - Each of our Folding Panel Mats are foldable into 2ft panels. Use the mat unfolded for tumbling, exercising and more. Fold up the mat and use it as an elevation advantage for plyometrics. You can also attach them end to end.
All of our mats are tested and pass CPSIA of 2008 and come with a 2 year warrant.

WE KNOW MATTING - When you purchase Folding Panel Mats from Tumbl Trak, you know that you’re getting a TRUE training product. Coaches, former athletes, and industry experts make up the Tumbl Trak Staff.
